content: The U.S. Open typically offers the highest total purse among the four major golf tournaments. In 2019, the total purse for the U.S. Open was $12.5 million, with the winner receiving $2.25 million. The Masters and the PGA Championship usually offer a total purse of around $11 million, while The Open Championship (also known as the British Open) typically has a total purse of around $10 million. However, these amounts can vary year-to-year.
